metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15224 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The rest-client gem 1.6.10 through 1.6.13 for Ruby, as distributed on RubyGems.org, included a code-execution backdoor inserted by a third party. Versions <=1.6.9 and >=1.6.14 are unaffected.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Only applies to the versions distributed via RubyGems.org, the Ubuntu packaged versions are not affected.

criterions.comment: ruby-rest-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
